Contradict fact: The claim that the horse was discovered living in an apartment in Preston, Lancashire contradicts the fact that the horse was actually a life-size statue in Galena, Illinois.
Understate: The claim understates the true nature of the horse as a statue rather than a living animal.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to back up the assertion that a horse was living in an apartment in Preston, Lancashire.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the photograph depicts a real horse living in an apartment, which is proven to be false.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the horse in the photograph is a statue and not a living animal, as revealed by close-up photographs and evidence from Google Street View.
